start_pattern_card.title: Start a new Pattern
start_pattern_card.text: Choose which method you want to use to start the new Pattern.

stitch_help_card.title: Stitches Help
stitch_help_card.select_text: Select a stitch from the drop down list. Once selected the stitch remains active. Any time a stitch on the crochet chart is clicked the program adds the selected stitch into this clicked stitch.
stitch_help_card.increase_text: The default method is increasing stitches. Switch the method to decreasing in the Stitch dialog. Alternatively left-click to increase and right-click to decrease.

auto_complete_card.title: Autocomplete Row/Round
auto_complete_card.text: Choose how many previous stitches you want to repeat for how long.
